text: “To the foreigners, likewise, who are not of your people Israel, but who come from a distant land for the sake of your name
And a man named Jairus, an official of the synagogue, came forward. He fell at the feet of Jesus and begged him to come to his house,
You are doing the works of your father!” [So] they said to him, “We are not illegitimate. We have one Father, God.”
